recipeInstructions.text: Thoroughly mix ingredients for crust (crackers, nuts, cinnamon, butter). Press on bottom and sides of 9 inch springform pan.

Combine eggs, cream cheese, sugar, salt, vanilla, and almond extracts. Beat until smooth. Blend in sour cream and nuts. Pour into crumb crust. Bake at 375F for about 35 minutes or until just set. Cool and chill thoroughly, for 4-5 hours.

Crush 1 cup strawberries. Add water and cook for 2 minutes. Sieve. Mix cornstarch with sugar and stir into hot berry mixture. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook and stir until thick and clear. Cool to room temperature. Place remaining strawberries on top of chilled cheesecake. Pour glaze over cake. Chill about 2 hours.
